abilities.description:
When you raise your shields, roll +your mech’s integrity or +wits. On a strong hit, set your shields to 4. On a weak hit, make them 3. On a miss, make them 2 but @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-1).

With shields raised, if you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3782f1b3c8ca8b88]{Withstand Damage}, ignore damage up to the value of your shields and suffer -1 shields. Raised shields last for a few minutes. If reduced to 0, they cannot be raised again for an hour or so.
